Name: Dragon Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Dragon-type moves from damaging Dragon-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Dragon-type Pokémon.  You can get a Dragon Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Royal Silk, a Dragon Dust, and a Dragon Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
